nbttooltip.config.showseparator.line1: Prints '- NBTTooltip -' before the NBT tag.
nbttooltip.config.showseparator.line2: This tag doesn't scroll with the text.
nbttooltip.config.compress.line1: The text won't have indentation and will.
nbttooltip.config.compress.line2: all align to the left margin.
nbttooltip.config.triggerType.line1: Determines when the tooltip should be shown. The key used for
nbttooltip.config.triggerType.line2: key-based triggers is configurable through the controls menu.
nbttooltip.config.showDelimiters.line1: Prints '- NBT start -' and '- NBT end -'.
nbttooltip.config.showDelimiters.line2: inside the tag, scrolling with the rest.
nbttooltip.config.ctrlSuppressesRest.lin: Allows to show just the NBT part of a tooltip
when holding CTRL down, hiding the rest.
nbttooltip.config.splitLongLines.line1: Divides long lines into multiple ones and
nbttooltip.config.splitLongLines.line2: places a sing at the beginning of each part.
nbttooltip.config.maxLinesShown.line1: The maximum amount of lines shown in a
nbttooltip.config.ticksBeforeScroll.line: The amount of ticks after which a new line
is shown when the tooltip is too long.
nbttooltip.config.tooltipEngine.line1: FRIENDLY uses a human-readable format for tooltips
nbttooltip.config.tooltipEngine.line2: JSON uses the standard JSON format for files.
nbttooltip.config.copyingEngine.line1: FRIENDLY uses a human-readable format to copy nbt
nbttooltip.config.copyingEngine.line2: JSON uses the standard JSON format for files.
